meanings.definition: A lifelike figure made of wax, typically representing a famous person.
meanings.sent1: The museum displayed a waxwork of the president.
meanings.sent2: Visitors marveled at the detailed waxwork of the movie star.
meanings.sent3: The waxwork of the celebrity seemed to wink at passersby.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as stiff as a waxwork in the museum.
meanings.sent5: The waxwork looked so real, it was almost eerie.

meanings.definition: The art or process of creating lifelike figures out of wax.
meanings.sent1: The artist's talent for waxwork was evident in the museum exhibit.
meanings.sent2: She studied waxwork techniques to improve her sculpting skills.
meanings.sent3: The class on waxwork was both informative and fun.
meanings.sent4: His attention to detail in his waxwork was truly impressive.
meanings.sent5: The museum offered a workshop on waxwork for aspiring artists.
